message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you considering the inflation.
I think a more even split is fairer. Let's start with 60 for me and 40 for you.  We can work towards a better deal in the next round if you prefer.
Bob, time is running out! This is my final offer -  $65 for me and $35 for you.  Any more rounds and the money will be worth even less, especially for you.
